# Correlação de Pearson 

\begin{equation}
r = \frac{\sum_{i = 1}^n (x_{i} - \overline{x})(y_{i}-\overline{y})}{\sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^n (x_{i}-\overline{x})^2} \sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^n(y_{i}-\overline{y})^2}}
\end{equation}
# Compactada 

\begin{equation}
r = \frac{Cov(X,Y)}{\sqrt{Var(x), Var(y)}}
\end{equation}


\begin{equation}
r = \frac{Cov(X,Y)}{\sigma(x) \sigma(y)}
\end{equation}


\begin{equation}
rk = \frac{Cov(x_{t}, x_{t-k})}{\sqrt{Var(x_{t}, x_{t-k})}} = \frac{Cov(x_{t}, x_{t-k})}{Var(x_{t})} = \frac{\gamma_{k}}{\gamma_{0}}
\end{equation}
